Service Details: - Provides our community with affordable meals in support of a balanced diet and healthy lifestyle - Individually portioned, frozen, and nutritionally balanced meals are available for sale- Meals are prepared by the Kitchen Connections team from scratch using local and organic food whenever possible- Meals are available for pick up and purchase by anyone in the community
Hours: Meals and Punch Cards available for purchase during office hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 4:00pm (program hours vary)
